plot outline: Srinivas (Anant Nag), although married to Parvati (Vanitha Vasu), has a love child named Jennifer (Vidisha Srivastava) with his mistress Mary (Roja). When she learns Srinivas is already married, Mary commits suicide. Srinivas leaves Jennifer in an orphanage run by a church. The girl grows up hating men because of her mother's death.
title: Nali Naliyutha
plot: Srinivas (Anant Nag), although married to Parvati (Vanitha Vasu), has a love child named Jennifer (Vidisha Srivastava) with his mistress Mary (Roja). When she learns Srinivas is already married, Mary commits suicide. Srinivas leaves Jennifer in an orphanage run by a church. The girl grows up hating men because of her mother's death.::Akash
